trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANQIQ112_03817_SEQ_00<tab>Qhoterl Pasol is attempting, unsuccessfully, to close her nostrils.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANQIQ112_03817_SEQ_01<tab>Deliver the requested items to Qhoterl Pasol.

TEXT_BANQIQ112_03817_TODO_00<tab><var 08 E4E80511 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Mine splendid natron in the depths of Lake Tusi Mek'ta)) ((Deliver the splendid natron to Qhoterl Pasol)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80512 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Gather splendid marimo in the depths of Lake Tusi Mek'ta)) ((Deliver the splendid marimo to Qhoterl Pasol)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80513 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Spearfish a splendid sponge in the depths of Lake Tusi Mek'ta)) ((Deliver the splendid sponge to Qhoterl Pasol)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.

TEXT_BANQIQ112_03817_QHOTERLPASOL_000_000<tab>Sometimes I wish I didn't have such a sensitive nose. When the workers come back from the caves, they carry with them the most pungent of odors! It really is quite unbearable!

TEXT_BANQIQ112_03817_QHOTERLPASOL_000_001<tab>Unfortunately, even a thorough scrubbing with warm water does little to remove the stench. I fear there is little choice but to resort to a rarely used treatment, and as you can imagine, the ingredients required are also rather rare themselves...
TEXT_BANQIQ112_03817_QHOTERLPASOL_000_010<tab>First, I'll need roughly three pinches of natron. Your cooperation will be most appreciated, I assure you!
TEXT_BANQIQ112_03817_QHOTERLPASOL_000_020<tab>First, I'll need roughly three marimo. Your cooperation will be most appreciated, I assure you!

TEXT_BANQIQ112_03817_QHOTERLPASOL_000_030<tab>First, I'll need a sponge, the living sort, but you'll need to hook the little scoundrel with your spear as they're far too crafty to take any bait. Your cooperation will be most appreciated, I assure you!
TEXT_BANQIQ112_03817_SYSTEM_100_040<tab>In order to proceed with this quest, you must first complete the quest “A New Fishing Ex-spear-ience” and unlock spearfishing.
TEXT_BANQIQ112_03817_QHOTERLPASOL_000_040<tab>Oh! I forgot to mention that you'll need to dive into the waters of Lake Tusi Mek'ta to find it!
TEXT_BANQIQ112_03817_QHOTERLPASOL_000_050<tab>Oh! I forgot to mention that you'll need to dive into the waters of Lake Tusi Mek'ta to find them!

TEXT_BANQIQ112_03817_QHOTERLPASOL_000_060<tab>It seems that Lake Tusi Mek'ta is relatively free of large, flesh-eating beasts, so your chances of being devoured alive are actually quite low! Welcome news, I'm sure!
TEXT_BANQIQ112_03817_QHOTERLPASOL_000_070<tab>Have you brought what I asked for? Please say you have!
TEXT_BANQIQ112_03817_QHOTERLPASOL_000_080<tab>Marvelous! Once the concoction is ready, those reeking reprobates will be the very pinnacle of cleanliness in just a few scrubs!
TEXT_BANQIQ112_03817_QHOTERLPASOL_000_081<tab>At the top of my list of candidates are my husband and son. Their combined stench is enough to curdle milk!
